Job Title: Brand Marketing Assoc III - Healthy Skin

Location: Ada, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Job title: Brand Marketing Associate III– Healthy Skin 

Department / Division: H&W / Marketing

Salary Range: $78,108 - $101,081

Location: Ada, MI

*Note: This position is a hybrid remote/office role, and you must be able to report in person to Ada on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays as part of our collaboration days, with Monday and Friday optionally in the office or working from home*

What’s special about this job:

In this role you will guide Amway’s Health Skin Platform investment by partnering directly with markets to deliver compelling HW programs including GTM Plans and activities; via providing goal-based customer & business owner solutions that encompass Lifestyle, Business Opportunity and Product.

How you would contribute to the role:

Guide Amway’s Heathy Skin Platform investment by partnering directly with markets to deliver compelling HW programs including GTM Plans and activities; via providing goal-based customer & business owner solutions that encompass Lifestyle, Business Opportunity, and Product. Partner in the development of global Healthy Weight and Healthy Aging business plans (short & long), annual operating plans and strategic direction for the enterprise. Lead the Global Healthy Skin POD and accountable to all market performance deliverables. Collaborate with Category Marketing Teams, Sales, I&S and Technology to bring platform programs / solutions to life in partnership with the markets. Core Responsibilities for global platform team include global Healthy Skin Portfolio Design, Social Media, Branding / Creative, H&W Technology Program/Solution Experience, Direction of Physical Presence / Virtual opportunity, Adjacent Space Innovation / Investments, Brand Guidance & Standards, Program, Solution & Product Training, Global Resourcing & Communication.

Other responsibilities include but not limited to:

Strategic Leadership: Partners with Healthy Weight and Healthy Aging lead to design global business plans for programs that deliver breakthrough growth, including annual category plans, and long-range marketing plans. Provides direction to Regions that helps to mine, bottle and scale Marketing plansNew Product/Technology Innovation & New Value Creation: Lead global, cross-functional teams to develop and inform launch of a robust and balanced pipeline of global new products to support the Amway Programs universal goals. Develop Adjacent Spaces: Assist in the development of global strategies and inform marketing plans to develop high-potential adjacent spaces, including priority segments, and hero products new to Amway and the world that will drive consumer penetration. Brand Equity: Participate in the development of consumer and ABO insights, global brand strategies, global campaigns, global brand standards, global best practices, creative and communications to improve global brand awareness among ABOs and consumers. Consumer and ABO Experience Journey: Provide strategic direction in the development of all global consumer journeys and partner with Sales on the ABO journey to ensure the ABO is the value creator. 

Required Qualifications:

Minimum 6 years brand management experience in a consumer products environmentExperience managing through highly specialized and experienced staff who exercise latitude, independence and technical authorityExperience managing innovative and technologically complex projects, functions and/or research activitiesBachelor’s degree in marketing, Business, or a related field

Skills to be successful in the role:

Strategic mindset and Marketing acumenDemonstrated background working with brand management principles and practicesTalent to merge qualitative and quantitative information, with the ability to extract meaningful insights that tell a story to all levels of leadershipTalent to work on projects with ambiguity, building a vision and seeking outcomes for impactAbility to interact positively and professionally with team members and clients from globally diverse cultural backgrounds

What’s special about this team:

At Amway, we believe in people. Our promise to our employees is that here, you have the opportunity to explore and grow, make a real difference, and be a part of Amway’s long-term success story. We believe in your potential and your ability to achieve your highest professional goals.

This role is not eligible for Sponsorship.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
